events.message: The applicant has submitted the loan application seeking funds to cover upcoming medical expenses.
Loan application has been categorized under Personal Loan based on descriptions related to medical and personal expenses.
Loan officer Jane Thompson has been assigned to this application to assist with the evaluation and next steps.
The initial review confirmed that the applicant meets the minimum income criteria and submitted the personal identification documents.
Requested additional documentation including recent medical bills and proof of insurance to complete assessment.
Applicant promptly submitted all required medical bills along with a confirmation letter from the healthcare provider.
Credit check was completed showing a good credit score with no recent delinquencies or defaults.
The risk assessment indicates a moderate risk due to some previous credit utilization but stable income and employment.
A personal loan offer of $15,000 was presented with an interest rate of 7.5% and flexible repayment options.
Applicant responded positively to the loan offer and requested clarification on the repayment schedule.
Application was escalated to the senior loan committee for review of exceptional circumstances related to medical needs.
The loan was approved by the senior committee with terms agreed upon and no additional conditions imposed.
Funds were transferred to the applicantâ€™s designated bank account as per the requested disbursement plan.
Follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant received the funds and to discuss any questions regarding repayment.
The loan application process has been completed and the file is now closed with all paperwork finalized.
